basic_identity.comment: This section contains essential identifiers and descriptions of the dataset.
basic_identity.dataset_id: System Generated - Will be generated by the system and should be unique for each dataset.
basic_identity.title: Mandatory - Title of the Dataset.

author.name: Mandatory - Name of the individual or organization responsible for the dataset.
author.organization: Optional - Name of the organization associated with the author, if applicable.

basic_identity.description: Mandatory - A detailed description of the dataset and its contents.
basic_identity.version: Optional - Version of the dataset, if applicable.
basic_identity.creation_date: Mandatory - Date when the dataset was created in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
basic_identity.last_updated: Optional - Date when the dataset was last updated in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

related_publication: Optional - Any papers related to the dataset's creation or use

usage.comment: This section details how the dataset can be used, including licensing and format.
usage.license: Mandatory - Type of license under which the dataset is distributed.
usage.format: Mandatory - Format of the dataset (e.g., CSV, JPEG, MP4, WAV, etc.).
usage.size: Mandatory - Size of the dataset, typically in MB or GB.

document.comment: This section provides links to the dataset itself and its accompanying documentation.
document.download_url: Mandatory - URL where the dataset can be downloaded.
document.documentation_url: Optional - URL to the dataset documentation or user guide.

format_details.comment: This section is conditional. Only fill out the subsection that corresponds to the format of your dataset.

csv.number_of_rows: Mandatory - Total number of rows in the CSV file
csv.number_of_columns: Mandatory - Total number of columns in the CSV file

columns.description: Mandatory - Description of the data each column holds
columns.type: Mandatory - Data type of the column (integer, string, date, etc.)

image.number_of_images: Mandatory - Total number of images in the dataset.
image.image_format: Optional - File format of the images (e.g., JPEG, PNG).

video.number_of_videos: Mandatory - Total number of videos in the dataset.
video.average_length: Optional - Average length of the videos (in minutes or seconds).
video.video_format: Optional - File format of the videos (e.g., MP4, AVI).

audio.number_of_audio_files: Mandatory - Total number of audio files in the dataset.
audio.average_length: Optional - Average length of the audio files (in minutes or seconds).
audio.audio_format: Optional - File format of the audio files (e.g., MP3, WAV).

related_datasets.comment: This section can include references to datasets that are related or derived from the current dataset.

usage_examples.comment: This section can be used to give examples of how the dataset has been or can be used.
usage_examples.description: Optional - Brief description of a usage example.
usage_examples.example_url: Optional - URL to more detailed information or code example.

citation.comment: If there is a recommended way to cite the dataset, include it here.
citation.citation_text: Optional - Recommended citation for the dataset.
